Detailed Description

Controller for asset retrieval and inherent optimizations.

The Asset controller tries to save bandwidth by compressing the plain text resources (e.g. CSS stylesheets, Javascript source code, etc.)

Definition at line 10 of file asset_controller.php.

Member Function Documentation

AssetController::init (  )  [protected]

Custom initialization for the controller object.

Subclassers should override this method to perform specialized initialization. The default implementation does nothing.

Reimplemented from BaseController.
